title: Colorado Dialect Project Fund
description: To provide support for the Colorado Dialect Project including data collection and a multimedia library at the University of Colorado Boulder. The project focuses on language in Colorado in order to learn what makes Colorado Dialects unique.
marketingContent: To provide support for the Colorado Dialect Project including data collection and a multimedia library at the University of Colorado Boulder. The project focuses on language in Colorado in order to learn what makes Colorado Dialects unique.
